metadataAttributes.Title: Databases and SQL for Data Science with Python
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Working knowledge of SQL (or Structured Query Language) is a must for data professionals like Data Scientists, Data Analysts and Data Engineers. Much of the world's data resides in databases. SQL is a powerful language used for communicating with and extracting data from databases.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Cloud Databases,Python Programming,Jupyter notebooks,Relational Database Management System (RDBMS),SQL,
